resources.string: Daily Kitten Bot is a tool you can use every day to find posts on Reddit that are important to you, and act on them.
Daily Kitten Bot is your Reddit assistant
Add your Reddit account to take actions on your favourite subreddits. Don\'t worry, Daily Kitten Bot will always check with you before it does anything!
Create rules to seek out content
Rules are governed by conditions and outcomes. Use conditions to determine which posts meet your criteria, and then set outcomes to choose what your actions will be.
Daily Kitten Bot generates recommendations from your rules. Approve a recommendation to enact it on Reddit, or reject it if it\'s not something you want to do.
Coming soon, Daily Kitten Bot will be able to run your rules regularly against each subreddit with your text.
Use the menu to add some sample rules, and find out just how easy it is to get started with Daily Kitten Bot!
